data.title: Where is Novi Sad, Serbia on Map Lat Long Coordinates

data.text:
Novi Sad, Serbia

Latitude and longitude coordinates are: 45.267136, 19.833549.

Novi Sad (Нови Сад) is the capital city of the province of Vojvodina, and the second-largest city in Serbia. Located in northern Serbia and northwest of Belgrade, it is one of the most beautiful cities and tourist spots, nestled right at the Danube River. The points of interest of Novi Sad include the Museum of Vojvodina, Fruška Gora National Park, Serbian National Theatre, Azbukum, Danube Park, Petrovaradinska tvrđava, Petrovaradin Fortress, Becarac beach, Institute of Nature Conservation of Vojvodina Province, Platoneum Building, Palace Iron Man, Tomin Palace, The Gallery of Matica Srpska, Štrand, Roman Catholic Church of the Name of Mary, Spens Sports center, Karađorđe Stadium, and BIG Shopping Center. Novi Sad is also a city of festivals, including the International Novi Sad Literature Festival, Novi Sad Jazz Festival, Novi Sad Samba Carnival, etc. The city is home to a few important higher educational institutions including the University of Novi Sad and Gymnasium Jovan Jovanović Zmaj. Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport serves the city.
